page.title: 04THE MAYOR OF UCKFIELD.
page.content: The Mayor and his 17 councillors have their meetings at{Wealden Lodge} which has recently replaced the Town Hall(used as a magistrates court). We met{Mr Foster},the 7th Mayor here to ask him questions about his job and the town, for the project. Mr Foster likes being the Mayor, particularly planning for the future of the town. In the next ten years the {population}will{increase by 50%}and planning for these people takes up a lot of his time.The council are going to build a covered swimming pool,3 BMX tracks,an indoor market, a primary school,a playing field and homes and shops for the new people. When Mr Foster attends town functions like carnivals and opening new places, he wears the Chain of Office.It is insured for Â£10000. Mr Foster enjoys living in Uckfield.
